pages.text: Having cursed items in your inventory has its prices. These prices are even more powerful if you're handling that item.

$(sangue)Blood/$ curses lower the efficiency of any effect that heals you.$(br)$(conhecimento)Knowledge/$ curses lower the efficiency of time healing your effort points.$(br)$(energia)Energy/$ lowers the efficiency in which you break blocks.$(br)$(morte)Death/$ increases every damage you take.
